message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. This is a great deal, considering its value to you is $8,000. I'm confident you'll love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $12,000 is too high for me. I'm willing to pay $5,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value.

Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $5,000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $9,000. This is a compromise that still benefits both of us, considering the product's value to you is $8,000. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.

Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $9,000 is still a bit too high for my budget. I can do $6,500. This offer reflects my serious interest while acknowledging the value you place on the product.

Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $6,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and counteroffer at $8,250. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me is $10,000. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  $8,000 is the highest I can go.  If you're unable to accept that, I understand, but I'll have to go with a different seller.

Hi Bob, I understand you're willing to go up to $8,000, but I'm still not willing to sell the product at that price. I'm willing to make one final counteroffer: $9,000. This is the highest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me is $10,000. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll consider it. If not, I'll have to consider other options.
